entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 02:00 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -15.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -18.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
